nodes.bodyText: You may want to set value[i] = 0; if it's null, since we enforced the check that null elements should be 0.  Btw. I think it's debatable if null elements should be 0 but we added this check some time ago.
@yingsu00 I believe you refer to this PR #13852 It added logic to populate zeros for null integer values, but not for floats. Hence, I think this can be left as is.
